text: harvey what can i do for you

question is why are you here
you seem hostile you investigate
publicly traded companies

hostility
power we tend to stick together when an

dropped by

us

all of them since when does the sec

all start there next week
he comes at our clients after what he

it'll be him

asses with the full power of the sec

how good you were

anyway here's the thing i'm really tired

importantly i've always thought that
eric woodall was a um
ah [ __ ] i'll just go ahead and say it
he's a dick finally something we can

before you start picking out floor

i'd like to discuss this with my partner
first i'd expect nothing less
oh uh just one more thing i haven't been

but in one more week i will which means

i would never threaten someone that i

it's just the truth
